SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class DoctorMedicalRecordController

Object
DoctorMedicalRecordController
public class DoctorMedicalRecordController extends Object
The DoctorMedicalRecordController class is responsible for managing medical records associated with a specific doctor. It facilitates the loading, saving, updating, and viewing of appointment outcome records.

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorMedicalRecordController

      public DoctorMedicalRecordController(String doctorId)
      Constructs a DoctorMedicalRecordController object for a specific doctor. It initializes the medical record components and loads initial appointment outcomes.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the unique ID of the doctor whose medical records are being managed.

  • Method Details

    • loadRecords

      public void loadRecords()
      Loads the initial set of appointment outcome records from persistent storage.

    • saveRecords

      public void saveRecords()
      Saves the current state of all appointment outcome records to persistent storage.

    • updateRecords

      public void updateRecords(String apptId)
      Updates a specific appointment outcome record.
      Parameters:
      apptId - the unique ID of the appointment to be updated.

    • viewRecords

      public void viewRecords()
      Displays all medical records associated with the doctor. Records are loaded, displayed, and saved afterward.

    • viewRecordsById

      public void viewRecordsById(String Id)
      Displays medical records associated with a specific appointment ID. Records are loaded, displayed, and saved afterward.
      Parameters:
      Id - the unique ID of the appointment whose records are to be viewed.
